goals__remit: Axel Springer is an integrated multimedia company in Europe offering digital and print media. The company's strategy focuses on its core competences excellent journalism, marketing and classified ads. Its broad media portfolio encompasses established multimedia brand families such as POLITICO.EU, the BILD- and WELT-Groups.
